sense.gloss: para para, disco dancing with synchronized arm motions

sdata.j: |パラパラ|と↑雨↑↓あめ↓が↑降↑↓ふ↓り↑始↑↓はじ↓めたな。↑傘↑↓かさ↓↑持↑↓も↓ってくればよかったよ。
sdata.e: I should have brought my umbrella. Large raindrops are starting to fall.

sdata.j: ↑授業↑↓じゅぎょう↓↑中↑↓ちゅう↓によく|パラパラ|↑漫画↑↓まんが↓↑作↑↓つく↓ってたなぁ。
sdata.e: You see, I often made flip-books during class.
